name: Soul Ark: New World
description:
Soul Ark is a 2D collectible RPG that provides fun with a strong emphasis on community.
Adventure in Net Sphere to collect awesome soul ark heroes and find the relic of a powerful legend.

▶ An Epic Story of War and Fate
A story of heroes to save the world without surrendering to fate!
Save a world in crisis by joining forces with other heroes and fight against Kunlun!

▶ Based on a Webtoon, Web Novel IP
Epic story by Lee Myoung-Jin who is the author of 'Ragnarok'
Have fun collecting charming heroes from the soul ark webtoon!

▶ Real-time Community
A powerful community where users directly communicate with each other in town!
Provides fun through various town events and content in soul ark universe!

▶ Extensive Content
Diverse content that is constantly updated!
Look forward to plenty of cooperative content as well!
